passives.name: Thorns
passives.effects: When struck by a basic attack [[on-hit]], deal {{as|20 {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' armor)}} magic damage|magic damage}} to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.
